alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Sunflower; Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 9:42PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Chicot, Ashley, Sunflower, Washington and Bolivar Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 938 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monticello, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dermott around 1010 PM CDT. Mcmillan Corner around 1025 PM CDT. Lamont around 1035 PM CDT. Winterville around 1040 PM CDT. Greenville and Metcalfe around 1045 PM CDT. Wayside around 1050 PM CDT. Leland around 1055 PM CDT. Tribbett, Estill and Darlove around 1100 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Arcola, Beulah, Pace, Doddsville, Winstonville, Duncan, Merigold and Halley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and north central and northwestern Mississippi.
